info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to manage role assignments. A role assignment grants access to Azure Active Directory users.
info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient

get.description: Gets all role assignments for the subscription.

parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignments at, above or below the scope for the specified principal.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: OK - Returns an array of role assignments.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

canDelegate.description: The Delegation flag for the role assignment

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignments at, above or below the scope for the specified principal.

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

parameters.name: api-version

canDelegate.description: The Delegation flag for the role assignment

put.description: Creates a role assignment by ID.

parameters.description: The ID of the role assignment to create.
parameters.name: roleId

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.
parameters.name: api-version

canDelegate.description: The Delegation flag for the role assignment

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

canDelegate.description: The delegation flag used for creating a role assignment

principalId.description: The principal ID assigned to the role. This maps to the ID inside the Active Directory. It can point to a user, service principal, or security group.

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

roleDefinitionId.description: The role definition ID used in the role assignment.

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: OK - Returns an array of role assignments.

parameters.description: The scope of the role assignment to create. The scope can be any REST resource instance. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider}/{resource-type}/{resource-name}' for a resource.
parameters.name: scope

parameters.description: The name of the role assignment to create. It can be any valid GUID.
parameters.name: roleAssignmentName

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.
parameters.name: api-version
